mapper.select: SELECT a.productId, a.insurePdId, b.clauseCode, b.kindCode, b.amount, c.premium, c.saleStrategy FROM dt_product_fact a INNER JOIN dt_product_ccic b ON a.productId = b.productId INNER JOIN dt_pdSaleStrategy_ccic c ON b.productId = c.productId and b.kindCode = c.kindCode AND b.clauseCode = c.clauseCode WHERE a.channlCode = #{channlCode} AND a.channlPdId = #{channlPdId} AND c.saleStrategy = #{saleStrategy}

SELECT a.productId, a.insurePdId, b.clauseCode, b.kindCode, b.amount, c.premium, c.saleStrategy FROM dt_product_fact a INNER JOIN dt_product_ccic b ON a.productId = b.productId INNER JOIN dt_pdSaleStrategy_ccic c ON b.productId = c.productId and b.kindCode = c.kindCode AND b.clauseCode = c.clauseCode xxxx AND c.dateRangeHigh >= #{duration}
